basics.name: Bertrand Dubaut
basics.label: Software Engineer - Ruby developer
basics.summary:
I'm a French software engineer living in Brisbane, Australia. I am 28, speak fluent English, and have a Master's degree in Computer Science from one of the top French Computer Engineering schools.

I am a ruby developer (Ruby on Rails, Grape API...) with strong software and cloud architecture skills. I am an Elixir enthusiast (functional programming), and keen to further my skills with front-end technologies like React or Relay.

My technology monitoring skills, up to date with the current state of our industry, will be appreciated. On a personal note, I have played baseball my whole life, including one year of college Baseball in California. I now play competitive Baseball and coach a youth team here in Brisbane in my spare time.

work.summary: Everydayhero is a crowdfunding platform aimed at charity fundraising.
Oomph is a platform for publishers and advertisers allowing them to create digital magazines or ads for mobile devices and tablets.

Visibleo is a web-marketing start-up based in the Paris Suburbs. They perform Facebook Ads and Google AdWords campaigns, while also creating websites for their clients. In charge of creating and developing web applications for the IT department of the company.

Reputation Squad is an E-Reputation agency in Paris: the company manages and monitors its clientsâ€™ reputation on the Internet. In charge of creating and developing web and social media monitoring tools for the agency
Consultant in projects for several large-scale French companies like Air France or Renault.
highlights: Managed a developer team based in India from France

interests.name: Baseball
interests.summary: The sport I have played all my life

interests.name: Mixology
interests.summary: Making cocktails is an advanced hobby of mine. It's just like cooking or baking, only I like to create sophisticated beverages.

interests.name: History
interests.summary: Learning about the History of all cultures is something that interests me a whole lot.

interests.name: Music
interests.summary: I played the piano at the Conservatorium when I was young. Now I am learning Ukulele because it's easier to carry around.
